entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Muncho Lake

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
